description: Starts with Masaru running in front of Yokohama Marine Tower towards an attacking Cockatrimon. Masaru introduces himself as a banch≈ç and explains that Digimon are running amok, and while they are creatures from the Digital World with unprecedented abilities, this is no problem as he will fight evil Digimon together with his friends. He briefly explains about Digisoul, and Agumon evolves to GeoGreymon. After the evolution scene and a named attack, he tells when the series starts airing, as the screen shows the series logo.
